translation.description: Malaysia is a highly open economy, with trade value exceeding 100% of GDP. Therefore, exchange rate surveillance is critical, particularly since the Ringgit is a free-floating currency. This dashboard presents official exchange rates from Bank Negara Malaysia for 27 currency pairs, giving you a comprehensive view of the Ringgit's performance beyond just the USD/MYR rate.

section_1.title: A snapshot of the Ringgit's performance against Malaysia's major trade partners

section_2.title: How is the Ringgit trending?
section_2.description: To ease visual exploration, the charts below are coloured based on performance of the Ringgit over the time period selected. Green indicates an overall appreciation, red indicates depreciation, and grey is used to indicate no or minimal change.
